pages.text:
about
fck
A Florida Favorite Since the 1980s
Welcome to R.J. Gator’s Florida Sea Grill & Bar, a laid-back lakeside destination that’s been serving up good times and great flavors for over four decades. Founded in 1986, we’ve grown from a local favorite into a must-visit spot in The Villages, known for our welcoming atmosphere, fresh seafood, and friendly service.
Waterfront Dining with a View
Situated in the heart of Lake Sumter Landing, R.J. Gator’s boasts one of the best patios in town—spacious, dog-friendly, and right on the water. Whether you're dining under the sun or relaxing under the stars, our outdoor seating lets you soak in the sights and sounds of Florida living. Inside, you’ll find a bright, casual space perfect for everything from family dinners to date nights.
A Taste of Florida
Our menu celebrates the bold, coastal flavors of the Sunshine State. From classic seafood dishes to American pub favorites, there's something here for every appetite. And with daily happy hour specials and a full-service bar, there’s always a reason to raise a glass at R.J. Gator’s.
Live Music, Local Vibes
What’s a Florida evening without live entertainment? We feature live music seven nights a week, bringing energy and rhythm to your dining experience. Locals and visitors alike gather here to eat, drink, and unwind—and chances are, you’ll leave humming a tune.
Come As You Are
Whether you're stopping by after a golf round, meeting friends for lunch, or enjoying a sunset dinner with your pup in tow, you’re always welcome at R.J. Gator’s. We’re proud to be part of this vibrant community and look forward to serving you with the same warm hospitality we’ve been known for since day one.
